portfolio.right: My creative spirit comes alive in the digital realm. With nimble fingers flying across the keyboard, I craft clear experiences out of nothing but ones and zeroes.

title: Solution Design
Development
about.subtitle: I am a frontend developer specializing in building modern and user-friendly digital products. I mainly work with React.js and Next.js. In every project, I prioritize user experience, clean code, and performance.
description: I have been working in the field since 2020 and have completed numerous projects across various domains.

Turning design into effective solutions and simplifying complex ideas through clear interfaces is my core approach. I work responsibly on every project, aiming to deliver results that serve real business goals and user needs.

content.title: Frontend Development
content.description: Building modern, fast, and responsive user interfaces.
content.fullDescription: I create high-quality frontend solutions focused on clean code, scalability, and performance.

content.title: UI / UX Implementation
content.description: Turning designs into intuitive user interfaces.
content.fullDescription: I implement interfaces with a strong focus on usability and user experience.

content.title: Performance & Optimization
content.fullDescription: I optimize web applications to ensure fast load times and smooth performance.

content.title: API Integration
content.fullDescription: I integrate APIs to build fully functional and data-driven web applications.

content.title: SEO Optimization
content.fullDescription: I apply technical SEO best practices to improve visibility and rankings.

content.title: Admin Panel Development
content.fullDescription: I build admin panels that allow efficient data management and control.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.content: For me, every project is more than just code — it is a responsibility. I strive to create high-quality digital solutions that combine business goals with a great user experience. Continuous learning, growth, and attention to detail are my main motivations.

content.description: I specialize in building corporate websites for companies, primarily in the textile industry. I develop modern, user-friendly, and high-performance interfaces that help businesses effectively present their products and strengthen their digital presence.
Delivered 50+ projects for clients from various business sectors, creating turnkey websites — from structure and design to full development and deployment.

Developed modern and functional websites for companies, brands, and artists. Worked on corporate websites, promo pages, and personal pages for performers, with a strong focus on responsiveness, loading speed, and visual style.
Taught a Frontend Development course and prepared more than 40 students for professional careers.

stack.title: React.js and 20+ React Libraries
stack.description: I build complex and scalable frontend applications using React.js. I have strong experience with state management, component architecture, and popular React libraries.

stack.title: Next.js and TypeScript
stack.description: I develop fast and SEO-friendly web applications with Next.js. Using TypeScript helps ensure code quality, reliability, and long-term maintainability.

stack.title: GitHub and GitLab
stack.description: I use Git for version control, team collaboration, and secure code management. Experienced with GitHub and GitLab workflows.

stack.title: Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap
stack.description: I create responsive and modern user interfaces using Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, focusing on clean design and efficient development.

title: Frequently Asked
Questions
questions.mot: I turn every idea into real results through thoughtful solutions, clean code, and a strong user experience.

questionsData.question: What technologies do you work with?
questionsData.answer: I mainly work with React.js and Next.js. I also use TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Git, and other modern frontend development tools.

questionsData.question: Do you build websites turnkey?
questionsData.answer: Yes, I develop websites end-to-end — from structure and interface to final build, optimization, and deployment.

questionsData.question: Do you work with SEO?
questionsData.answer: Yes, I handle technical SEO optimization, including semantic markup, meta tags, page speed optimization, and SEO-friendly site structure.

questionsData.question: Do you develop admin panels?
questionsData.answer: Yes, I create functional and user-friendly admin panels for managing content, users, and project data.

questionsData.question: How can we start working together?
questionsData.answer: You can contact me via the contact form or directly. After discussing your requirements, I will propose the best solution and timeline.
